name: ATM Machine App
description: The user can create a person, account and an ATM in terminal. User can enter their personal pin code and check their balance and withdraw money.

name: Library App
description: The user can create a library and a visitor in terminal. The librarian can check the library's collection of books, but also check available books. The visitor can checkout book and see return date.

name: Address Book App
description: The user can add new contacts which will be added in a list.
